posts.title: Introduction to AI
posts.body:
The design choices react team have made in useEffect hook are still a heated debate. Some people like it and some don’t.

If you don't come from the React world it’ll definitely sound strange because its default behaviour is the dreaded “Infinite Render Loop” which is pretty easy to run into. For example

useEffect(()=>{console.log("Hello World")})
Looks fine right?
Nope, this will print “Hello World” in every render and the React dev OCD in me can't wait to put a second dependency array like this

posts.title: Viscous Authority
posts.body: As I come up with post about viscous authority. It is within my deepest grandeurs that such mannerisms be abquinted to say the least. The day was filled with such frivolous entanglements that brought so much joy to the fellow revellers. The day thus as we say all in ternary without shennanighans.

posts.title: In Conclusion
posts.body: N/B: It is to be noted that farmers should properly market the goats and the goat products to potential clients. This will help put out the word outside there and you will always be given priority whenever such need arises. Extensive marketing will ensure the farmer will always have the necessary market, thus they will be able to make profits from this venture. All in all, goat farming is a profitable venture that if undertaken properly will bring the farmer immense profits.

posts.title: You are
posts.body: Way maker miracle worker light in the darkness my God that is who you are.

posts.title: I'm gonna miss you daily
posts.body:
Remember when love was all that mattered, I do. Remember all we used to do in the starlight of the night. 
You're just another scar left on my heart, a sign we are meant to be apart. And even though I know you're not the one I'm gonna miss you daily.
